features: Upper: A versatile and sporty sandal. Available in full grain leather. Hook and loop strap closure for an easy adjustable fit. Synthetic lining
Footbed: Clean, modern PU-like EVA foam footbed with synthetic topcover
Midsole: Molded BPU-PU wedge wrapped in synthetic. 2” off-set
Outsole: Rubber cupsole construction with iconic Sorel scallop & razor design for enhanced traction & durability in key wear areas
